Class SampleKMeansInitialization<V extends NumberVector<?>,D extends Distance<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans.AbstractKMeansInitialization<V>

    V - Vector type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    KMeansInitialization<V>

    public class SampleKMeansInitialization<V extends NumberVector<?>,D extends Distance<?>>
extends AbstractKMeansInitialization<V>
    Initialize k-means by running k-means on a sample of the data set only.
